description: This time on Boys First Time Mareo was chilling out by Damiens house and looking thru his draw when he happend to come across a gay porn. So he being the curious guy that he is decided to watch a bit of it until Damien walks in on him. Now he never tried being with another guy before but the movie had him quite tempted so one thing led to another and before you know it Damien was giving Mareo a blowjob.
title: Boy Meets Boy
